name: Don't Trust The AI
description:
Don't trust the AI!
In this game you get objectives to complete in minigames, but don't trust the AI, as they will tell you the opposite of what to do, with a total of 14 games (including variant minigames) you have to complete the objective in 10 seconds!

Warning: Do not play this game in fullscreen, as some bugs may arise from it!

You can share your high score in the comments!

Fonts used in the game are:

  • Ink Free Font by Steve Matteson
  • VCR OSD Mono by Riciery Leal
